alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 9:03PM PST until January 30 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SUNDAY TO 3 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow showers expected. A dusting to two inches of snow is expected at elevations between 3000 and 5000 feet with up to three inches above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 PM Sunday to 3 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow accumulation possible on area roadways down to around 3000 feet including portions of highway 33 and Lockwood Valley Road.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
